mapper.select: SELECT items.id as id, items.no as no, items.name as name, items.cid1 as cid1, items.cid2 as cid2, items.is_online as is_online, items.sort as sort, items.src as src, items.thumb as thumb, items.place as place, items.summary as summary, items.notice as notice, items.notice_color as notice_color, items.description as description, items.created_at as created_at, items.updated_at as updated_at, items.deleted_at as deleted_at, c1.name as cid1_name, c2.name as cid2_name FROM items LEFT JOIN category c1 on items.cid1 = c1.id LEFT JOIN category c2 on items.cid2 = c2.id WHERE items.id=#{id} AND is_online = 1 AND c1.is_delete=0 AND c1.is_delete=0
